allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add universal image processing scripts and update gitignore

- Add convert_to_svg.sh: Converts PNG to SVG with intelligent method selection
  * Supports raster-embedded SVG for high quality preservation
  * Attempts true vectorization for simple graphics
  * Handles organized directory structures (png/original, png/no-bg, etc.)
- Add optimize_logos.sh: Optimizes images with smart background removal
  * Auto-detects light/dark backgrounds
  * Creates three variants: original, no-bg, and no-bg-alt
  * Organizes outputs in structured png/ directories
- Update .gitignore to exclude .DS_Store files
EOF
)")
